decision_conditions: <span id="docs-internal-guid-745e8b17-7fff-980f-7842-020d52e4d59f"><p style="line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans and documents hereby approved detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority, in writing, prior to occupation. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved:</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">a: <span style="font-size: 14px;">Increase rows of planters</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">b:</span></span></p></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-a2731e6f-7fff-6a4b-3812-52ee800ecc11"><div style="text-align: justify;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-73cc5340-7fff-775a-db73-b038e64a5ca6"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.44; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Prior to the occupation of the development a Servicing and Delivery Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority setting out:</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></div></span></div><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">a: Frequency of deliveries per day/week;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">b: size of vehicles; </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><br></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">c: </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">how vehicles would be accommodated on the public highway and&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">thereafter deliveries and servicing shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plan.</span></p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b5dbc894-7fff-c7e9-4677-7a4ce7ca5fec"><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></div></span><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the free flow of traffic or public safety along the neighbouring highway(s).</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></div></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-943f5e05-7fff-7d7a-8d80-8605243490fe"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">No deliveries shall be taken or dispatched from the premises outside</span> <span style="font-size: 14px;">8am to 7pm Monday to Friday and 8am-18:00 Saturday and Sunday</span><b>. </b></span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Reason: <span style="font-size: 14px;">To safeguard from noise and disturbance of late night or early morning deliveries to residential occupiers</span>.</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></div></span>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Details of dustbin recycling enclosures showing the design, location and external appearance, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the use commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-3cb1dd58-7fff-3570-ce5e-9f2dc929a0f3"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: In order to provide for adequate bin enclosures in the interest of the appearance of the site and area</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Prior to occupation, a Lighting Strategy shall be provided for the whole site&nbsp;to be submitted and approved by the local planning authority. The development shall not be carried out other than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 14px;">Reason</span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve; text-align: justify;">: To ensure safety of residents and satisfactory living conditions for residents and visitors to the site.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="text-align: left; line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">A detailed cycle plan is required to show notwithstanding what is shown on the approved plans, secure parking for 12 cycles serving the development site, and visitor parking shall be made available, prior the first occupation of the relevant sections of the development hereby approved</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">.</span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: italic; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> </span><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved</span>.&nbsp;</span><span style="text-align: justify; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To ensure that a reasonable provision is made within the site for the parking of bicycles in the interest of relieving congestion in surrounding streets and improving highway conditions in general</span><span style="text-align: justify; background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">.</span></p>

<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Details of the position, type and finish of external flue, and ductwork and any other ventilation equipment shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before work/use commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved</span>.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></p>

<p>The use hereby permitted may only operate between ( 08:00-20:00) hours Monday-Friday and (08:00-18:00 ) hours on Saturday, Sunday and Bank Holidays.
</p><p>REASON:&nbsp;<span style="font-family: Arial;">To ensure that the use operates in a satisfactory manner and does not unduly disturb adjoining occupiers or prejudice local amenity generally.</span></p><p><span style="font-family: Arial;"><br></span></p>

The noise level from all plant and machinery included in the approved development shall at all times remain 5dB(A) below background levels when measured at any nearby residential window or other sensitive receptor if appropriate (add/delete as appropriate)


REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
subdivision_of_building: these proposals do not interfere with existing buildings
description: Installation of 4x 20 ft metal containers and 1 no. 40 ft container along the perimeter of Bohemia Place Market car park. To facilitate 10 kiosks for start-up businesses within Use Class E and market stalls
